post.body: what did she think of the 4th book?
LOL! Yes, being able to save the world indeed be a great thing to know ;-)
okay, that does look really neat! Wish I knew about it before we bought the other laptop desk! LOL
you are not alone! I'm still not dressed, and you know what, I have no plans to change out of pj's ALL day LOL!
my dd wouldn't do soy at first ... but after a while she did .. but she needed steps LOL Rice, then soy, and now we do lactaid
I know you weren't asking me, but when my dd first went off dairy, we found rice milk was what she adapted to the fastest =)
oh we tried to do grow one one year. It just didn't work :-( We were sad.
she is such a brat! LOL! We read a couple of them but the kids never really got into them - thankfully! LOL
my girl loved her new bows http://www.flickr.com/photos/brandie160/3137839652/ =) thank you!
anyone else an Avatar fan? My son is running around being Eng ... but he told me "I don't know how to save the world" So cute! LOL
It's Monday. I'm tired. I stayed up too late last night!
Reading Understanding Exposure. Except, I'm not sure I really understand it. Learning to shoot better pictures is going to be a LONG process
took lots of pictures with new dslr camera - still need to learn how to take good ones though. Feel free to send wibsite/book suggestions!
going to a party - the last Christmas party of the year!
Going to the bookstore! Gotta buy Some photography books! Yea :)
watching The Office which I just ordered from Netflix. I could get used to this!
